title: Provide Proof of Delivery (POD)
description: A retailer claims they never received a shipment. A support agent must provide the proof of delivery.

tasks.description: Identify the order in question and its tracking number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the order and tracking number.

tasks.description: Look up the tracking number on the carrier's website to retrieve the proof of delivery document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the POD, which includes a signature from the retailer's employee.

tasks.description: Send the proof of delivery document to the retailer to resolve the claim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully emails the POD to the customer.
